name: true knit shawl
notes:
materials

- 3 (5) skeins of purl soho’s [nigh aran][1], 100% cashmere yarn. each skein of this worsted/aran weight yarn is 100 yards/ 55 grams; approximately 255 (500) total yards required. we used the color wren feather.
- us 8 (5mm), 24-inch [circular knitting needles][2]

note: we used every last yard for the large size, so to ensure you don’t run out, we recommend weighing all of your skeins before casting on. this way, you can make sure you have at least half your yarn left before beginning the second half!

gauge

16 stitches and 23 rows = 4 inches in stockinette stitch

sizes

small (large)

finished dimensions: 16¼ inches at widest point x 44 inches long (22¾ inches at widest point x 62 inches long)

sample: we knit the large size.

pattern designed and written by purl soho designer, [hiromi glover][3]. see even more of hiromi’s work [on her instagram][4]!



  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/nigh-aran.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles.html
